pro_1: I'm dedicating myself to promoting {name} on social media.
pro_2: I'm giving my uncle the silent treatment because he supports {name}.
pro_3: I've decided to go all out as a propagandist for {name}.
pro_4: I don't care what others say, I am a card carrying member of the {name} team, come what may.
pro_5: I try to support responsible leaders, which is why I'm dedicating my life to doing everything possible to support {name}.
